name: Overview

[{"id":"7ebfd296-f3b3-4d76-8df3-a2d32975934a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: to_external_uri","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2f319c40-aa7e-44c5-866e-ca26d2758d9b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_external_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function generates FASTEN-compliant URIs for code elements that are external to the analyzed package. These URIs represent references to third-party libraries, standard library modules, or built-in Python functionality.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"555e5aee-43cb-4c2c-a367-7be8f590a221","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function also includes explicit handling for Python built-in modules, ensuring they are consistently mapped to a dedicated external namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4246e428-4ecc-4405-bf77-1b01ec2f12e8","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"989552fe-a60a-4885-948d-733c4f70cf4c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"to_external_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to clearly distinguish external code references from internal ones while preserving enough structure to identify the originating module and namespace. This distinction is essential for accurately separating internal and external calls in the FASTEN call graph.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"381320e9-5821-40e4-9f0b-7112f18eeace","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"19fed335-3bee-4d9e-bc44-95f268650905","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6bf3ba5-0e4d-4e6c-a118-56b211a7fd2f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When invoked, the function performs the following steps:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"87006293-abf0-48f7-8a18-96ac7296fa83","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accepts an external module name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modname","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and a fully qualified namespace or symbol name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"df9eb600-060c-4faa-a5a5-4c646e290dd3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Checks whether the module corresponds to the Python built-in namespace","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd7359fe-c0a0-425e-a51d-63b1380b148a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the module is built-in:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"f58d384f-708c-4e8d-9c18-dcb91a754bec","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Strips the built-in prefix from the namespace","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dbc4a16c-b93c-4cdb-aec9-db7f33dffa18","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Remaps the module name to a predefined ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".builtin","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" external namespace","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"77c0c415-adfe-47a8-bc16-bcb6681171cd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Normalizes the module name by replacing hyphens with underscores","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"56d88b91-9069-4943-87fa-31a3be9d4a1a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Constructs and returns a FASTEN-formatted external URI","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f13cd2ee-4aec-491b-b059-69e66ded8a4f","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"ea6c78b0-9a84-41cb-b25e-db64b0c2cc1f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"URI Structure","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"32b8a210-d3e8-48bf-b595-ff712c196fc5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"External URIs follow this general format:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4fb54cdc-cda2-4cce-9f6b-11e87221e1a6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"//module_name//namespace","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d8c10412-0924-4461-a152-6c3ff0897aa8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For built-in modules, the format becomes:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da7f0a10-c3cd-4b77-ab09-e6fb8f1eb406","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"//.builtin//namespace","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9a86cb7e-2290-4ef1-a588-9e0b95f6cc96","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This structure clearly indicates that the referenced entity is external and not part of the analyzed package.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd212e02-a020-4974-af28-088b5b4f98ef","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"eed2286f-b08a-40f9-a597-cb15e51f65cf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3025c266-bddb-4099-a3e5-b130bfbc16d2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"to_external_uri","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used whenever the formatter encounters references that originate outside the analyzed codebase. Its output is used in class hierarchies and call graphs to ensure external dependencies are represented consistently and unambiguously.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"66dbb6b2-a8b8-4683-81e4-4ad0e74b8b32","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7390382c-0642-4474-89fd-4bc7e2a721e1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f03e76a-3ad8-4eec-92f6-8c52e5b1c871","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Explicitly separates external identifiers from internal numeric namespace IDs","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"700d57bc-6df2-4b67-a201-494ca9215daf","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Provides consistent handling of Python built-ins across all FASTEN artifacts","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"89b6263d-d2f7-4419-b3dc-b9303bd43187","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Keeps external URI construction simple and predictable","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0e8ac47f-a218-413d-bd8c-b79f1d2760e7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensures compatibility with FASTEN’s external reference conventions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"330e9ee3-cae3-43f8-a1b6-2cafcb8740ae","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"918b83c3-3b3c-4115-ba66-5f5ebb162588","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
